overview.title: Overview
overview.subtitle: Last updated: Feb 11, 2026 · 09:41 AM EST
overview.aiDescription: Your portfolio risk is currently moderate. The primary risk driver is a high correlation concentration (0.67) between US and International equities, which reduces diversification benefits during market downturns. Annualized volatility increased 2.1% month-over-month, primarily driven by recent tech sector earnings uncertainty. Consider increasing fixed income allocation by 3-5% to improve risk-adjusted returns. The current Sharpe ratio of 1.45 suggests favorable risk-reward, but sector-level VaR indicates elevated tail risk in the technology sub-portfolio.
overview.emptyPortfolio: No coins in your portfolio yet
overview.emptyPortfolioDesc: Add coins to track value, P&L and risk analysis

risk.title: Risk Report
risk.subtitle: Comprehensive risk metrics and analysis
risk.highConcentrationDesc: Technology exposure represents 31.6% of portfolio with annualized volatility of 28.4%. This exceeds the recommended 25% sector cap.
risk.varDescription: The portfolio's 95% Value at Risk of -3.2% translates to a potential daily loss of approximately $41,105. The max drawdown of -8.7% occurred during the October correction, recovering within 18 trading days.
risk.correlationDescription: Fixed income allocation provides adequate downside hedging. However, the correlation between equity sectors increased from 0.52 to 0.67 over the past quarter, reducing portfolio diversification benefit.
risk.recommendationDesc: Reduce tech allocation by 5-7% and increase international fixed income exposure to improve risk-adjusted returns and lower correlation concentration.

stress.title: Stress Test
stress.subtitle: Scenario-based portfolio impact analysis
stress.marketCrashDesc: Simulates a broad equity market selloff of 20%, with correlated credit spread widening and flight-to-quality in treasuries.
stress.rateHikeDesc: Models a rapid 200 basis point increase in the federal funds rate with cascading effects on bond prices and rate-sensitive equities.
stress.cryptoWinterDesc: Simulates a 60% decline in digital assets with limited contagion to traditional markets, primarily affecting alternative allocations.
stress.baselineVsStressed: Baseline vs. stressed scenario over 90 days

alerts.title: Alerts
alerts.subtitle: Risk notifications and system events
alerts.techOverexposureMsg: Technology allocation has reached 31.6%, exceeding the 25% sector concentration threshold. Consider rebalancing.
alerts.volatilitySpikeMsg: Annualized portfolio volatility increased by 2.1% month-over-month. Current level: 14.8%.
alerts.varBreachMsg: Daily Value at Risk (95%) has exceeded -3.0% alert threshold. Current VaR: -3.2%.
alerts.correlationUpdateMsg: Cross-sector correlation matrix updated. Average pairwise correlation increased from 0.52 to 0.67.
alerts.rebalancingCompleteMsg: Automated rebalancing executed successfully. Fixed income allocation increased from 22% to 25%.
alerts.monthlyReportMsg: January 2026 risk report has been generated and is ready for review.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure your preferences
settings.profileDesc: Manage your account details and preferences
settings.riskThresholdAlertsDesc: Get notified when risk scores exceed defined thresholds
settings.dailySummaryDesc: Receive a daily email summary of portfolio performance
settings.darkModeDesc: Use dark color scheme throughout the application
settings.compactViewDesc: Reduce card padding for higher information density

coinDetail.longTermDesc: Monthly-yearly analysis based on macro trend
coinDetail.analysisShortBullish: Strong upward momentum in the last 24h. Price is above the short-term moving average, indicating buying pressure.
coinDetail.analysisShortBearish: Downward pressure detected in the last 24h. Price has fallen below the short-term moving average.
coinDetail.analysisShortNeutral: Price is consolidating with no clear direction in the short term. Watch for a breakout.
coinDetail.analysisMediumBullish: Positive weekly trend with price above 50-period SMA. Momentum favors continued upside.
coinDetail.analysisMediumBearish: Negative weekly trend. Price is below the 50-period SMA, suggesting further downside risk.
coinDetail.analysisMediumNeutral: Sideways movement over the past week. No strong directional bias detected.
coinDetail.analysisLongBullish: Long-term uptrend confirmed. Price is above 200-period SMA with strong macro momentum.
coinDetail.analysisLongBearish: Long-term downtrend in play. Price remains below 200-period SMA with bearish macro outlook.
coinDetail.analysisLongNeutral: Price is near the long-term average. Market is undecided on macro direction.

dca.title: DCA & HOLD Analysis
dca.basedOnVWAP: Based on VWAP, Support & Volume Profile
dca.disclaimer: This analysis is based on historical data and technical indicators. It is NOT financial advice. Always do your own research before making investment decisions.

riskEngine.title: Risk Analysis
riskEngine.signalBuyReason: SMA50 is above SMA200, indicating a bullish trend. Favorable conditions for entry.
riskEngine.signalHoldReason: SMA50 is below SMA200 but RSI is above 50. Maintain current position.
riskEngine.signalHoldOverboughtReason: Bullish trend confirmed but RSI is elevated. Hold and wait for better entry.
riskEngine.signalHoldDefaultReason: No strong directional signal detected. Maintain current position.
riskEngine.signalSellReason: SMA50 is below SMA200 with weakening momentum. Consider reducing exposure.
riskEngine.signalAccumulateReason: RSI is oversold and price is below SMA50. Good opportunity to accumulate.
riskEngine.signalAccumulateOversoldReason: Deeply oversold conditions detected. Potential opportunity to accumulate at discount.
riskEngine.signalReduceRiskReason: RSI is overbought and volatility is rising. Consider taking profits and reducing risk.
riskEngine.disclaimer: Risk analysis is based on historical price data and statistical models. Past performance does not guarantee future results. This is NOT financial advice.
